name: FlourishDailyPhrases
0:
”Alexa, open flourish daily quote”
”Alexa, start flourish daily quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flourish daily quote
des: Start your day with a flourish daily quote. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. Add this skill into your morning or evening routine. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
